QA Manual Engineer,Andersen,Не указано,Не указано,"The IT-company Andersen invites an experienced QA Manual Engineer to work on a large-scale Banking project.

The customer is one of the leading commercial banks in Kazakhstan, which was founded in 1988. The bank's core business is corporate and retail banking. It offers a wide range of financial products and services, such as loans, deposits, cards, insurance, investments and pensions, and is also actively involved in the securities market and foreign exchange operations in Kazakhstan. The Bank serves more than 100 thousand legal entities and 1.5 million individuals. It has 19 branches, more than 160 outlets, and the number of full-time staff is 1500+.
The position requires working in Almaty.
Responsibilities:
Performing functional, integration, UI, API, and mobile testing.
Creating and maintaining test plans and test strategies.
Using DBMS and SQL for testing and data validation.
Testing REST APIs, working with HTTP/HTTPS, XML, and JSON.
Developing and implementing testing processes from scratch.
Must-haves:
Experience as a QA Engineer from 1,5 years.
Experience with various types of testing, with a focus on mobile testing, including functional, integration, UI, and API testing.
Proficiency in working with DBMS and SQL for testing and data validation.
Understanding of REST API, HTTP/HTTPS protocols, and data formats like XML and JSON.
Knowledge of Git for source code management.
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
Knowledge of SQL for database testing.
Knowledge of Charles Proxy/Proxyman for network traffic analysis.
Knowledge of Postman for API testing and automation.
Familiarity with Xcode and its usage.
Knowledge of Jira for issue tracking and Confluence for documentation.
Level of English – from Pre-Intermediate and above.
Nice-to-haves:
Knowledge of Swift for iOS and Kotlin for Android.
Any experience in automating testing of native applications.
Knowledge of Swift/Kotlin.
Experience in building and implementing testing processes from scratch.
Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc.
The opportunity to change the project and/or develop expertise in an interesting business domain.
Job conditions – you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant.
Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee.

Специалист по медиапланированию / Digital Media Planner,ТОО WUNDER DIGITAL (ВУНДЕР ДИДЖИТАЛ),"Алматы, комплекс Нурлы-Тау",Не указано,"Команда Wunder Digital - инновационный digital-хаб с глобальной экспертизой. Работаем с клиентами из списков Fortune-1000 и «РБК-500». Оказываем полный цикл digital-сопровождения с помощью передовых технологий и инструментов, а также команды экспертов с международным опытом.

За восемь лет работы на рынке Казахстана мы собрали в портфолио крупнейшие бренды из разных сфер бизнеса: банки, авто, недвижимость, фарма, e-commerce, мобильные операторы и интернет-провайдеры, FMCG. Наши клиенты открыты к новому — подходам, инструментам, процессам — и это то, что нас объединяет.

Одна из наших ценностей — инновационность. Это значит, что мы используем современные маркетинговые подходы к работе с аудиториями, каналами и инструментами, развиваем Data-Driven-культуру принятия решений, оптимизируем работу с помощью искусственного интеллекта.
Имеем статусы Meta Business Partner и Google Premier Partner.

Финалисты Google Premier Partners Awards 2024 в номинации Workplace Excellence, а также крупнейших рекламных фестивалей СНГ — TAF! 2022-2023 и ADMA 2022-2024. Призеры Tagline Awards 20219 (серебро) и 2022 (бронза).
Является партнерами Центрально-Азиатской Рекламной Ассоциации (ЦАРА).
О должности:
Если вам интересно создавать истории успеха в диджитал-маркетинге, а также решать сложные маркетинговые головоломки, то эта позиция может вас заинтересовать.
Что вас ждет:
Разработка комплексных медиапланов продвижения для разных категорий клиентов: финансы, недвижимость, авто, e-commerce и др.
Обоснование выбора эффективного сплита инструментов и рекламных форматов
Анализ эффективности рекламных кампаний, оперативная/аналитическая отчётность, визуализация в презентациях
Анализ конкурентов с помощью специальных сервисов
Работа со статистическими данными для определения объема ЦА
Взаимодействие в задачах со стратегом
Взаимодействие со смежными подразделениями агентства (PPC, SMM, дизайн, SEO)
Пригодится:
Опыт в разработке медиапланов для Digital направления.
Опыт в подготовке и защите презентаций.
Опыт в выборе / разработке методики и подготовки анализа конкурентов.
Опыт в построении портрета ЦА, определении размера ЦА.
Понимание основ подбора KPI для проекта, исходя из цели РК, расчет оптимального бюджета РК с учетом сезонности.

Понимание методов оценки эффективности рекламных кампаний в Yandex.Direct, Google Adwords, Google Management Platform, Вконтакте, Facebook, myTarget, TikTok и др. Чем шире ваш инструментарий — тем лучше. И здесь не про технические навыки настройки, а про глубокое понимание понимание систем и инструментов запуска.
Знание системы аналитики (GA, Яндекс. Метрика) и систем мобильной аналитики
Хорошие навыки работы в Excel (сводные таблицы, формулы).
Что мы предлагаем:
Разнообразные задачи: вы поработаете с веб-платформами, мобильными приложениями и офлайн-продуктами. Поможете достигать целей и расти известным брендам.
Работу с клиентами из топ-100 рынка, среди которых: Freedom Bank, Bereke Bank, STADA, Gedeon Richter, BI Group, «Спортмастер», MonAmie, TECHNODOM, Smart Stroy и др.

Культуру инноваций: с помощью трендовых инструментов и доступу к более чем 50 специализированным программам оптимизируете свое время и «ручной труд». Так вы сможете делать больше за тот же период. Мы ценим инициативу и поддерживаем идеи, связанные с инновациями. Развиваем систему внутренних интерактивных тренингов, чтобы сотрудники разных подразделений умели с ними работать. Ведем внутренний реестр инноваций, где уже сегодня — более 100 проектов, больше половины из которых запущены.

Профессиональный менеджмент: руководители команд организуют работу так, чтобы это было эффективно и продуктивно на всех уровнях, приветствуют проактивность и вкладываются в развитие сотрудников. С нами вы можете инициировать собственные проекты, влияя на жизнь отдела и даже компании с помощью инициативы «Есть идея», расти в компетенциях и грейдах, подтверждая знания сертификатами.
Глобальное влияние: сможете поучаствовать в проектах, перенять опыт рынков Узбекистана, Беларуси и России.
Гарантии трудоустройства: вы будете оформлены официально по ТК Республики Казахстан. График работы: с 10:00 до 19:00, 5/2. Есть возможность работать удаленно два раза в неделю.
Инвестиции в ваш рост: сможете посещать конференции, проходить расширенное внутреннее обучение, а также внешнее с компенсацией расходов (по запросу).

Развитие экспертизы: при желании сможете транслировать свою экспертизу и опыт в рамках агентства в качестве спикера на внешних и внутренних мероприятиях. Мы постоянно участвуем в конференциях и проводим собственные для клиентов — Wunder to Business, вебинары. А также обмениваемся опытом между командами на Wunder Pitch Day.
Комфорт: у нас есть оплачиваемый выходной в честь Дня рождения, скидки от партнеров для сотрудников Wunder Digital, корпоративное ДМС, а также оплачиваемые обеды.

Комьюнити: будем отдыхать на больших агентских тимбилдингах и корпоративах, узнавать друг друга лучше на командных встречах в офисе, разделять вместе хобби — играть в командные игры, смотреть кино на Wunder Movie Night, выполнять спортивные челленджи в рамках Wunder Club.

Мы даем возможность решать амбициозные задачи, которые не только развивают рынок, но и прокачивают вашу экспертизу. Работая у нас, вы будете создавать тренды, использовать передовые технологии и инструменты, которые недоступны конкурентам.

Веб-приложения для аналитики данных (дашборды, отчётность, интерактивные графики)
Инструменты интеграции и визуализации больших объёмов данных
Внутренние сервисы по управлению контентом, настройке потоков данных и т.д.
СТЕК ТЕХНОЛОГИЙ НА ФРОНТЕНДЕ:
React (CRA или Next.js), Redux (или другие state-менеджеры), TypeScript, JSX/TSX, Webpack, а также библиотека компонентов (Material UI, Ant Design или аналогичные).
Мы ценим чистый код, следование лучшим практикам в разработке и внимательное отношение к UX/UI.
ОБЯЗАННОСТИ:
Разработка новых компонентов и функционала на базе React и TypeScript для аналитических веб-приложений.
Оптимизация и поддержка существующих интерфейсов, улучшение производительности и UX.
Интеграция frontend-части с backend-сервисами (REST/GraphQL API).
Участие в проектировании архитектуры клиентской части и выборе технологий.
Написание unit- и интеграционных тестов, ревью кода коллег.
Активное взаимодействие с командой бэкенда, QA и дизайнерами.
ТРЕБОВАНИЯ:
Уверенные знания React (Hooks, Context, React Router), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3.
Опыт работы со state-менеджерами (Redux, MobX или др.) и понимание клиентской архитектуры.
Понимание принципов REST, опыт интеграции с backend-сервисами.
Опыт построения фронтенд-архитектуры крупных приложений (SPA, SSR).

Понимание процесса CI/CD (GitLab CI, GitHub Actions и т.д.).
ПЛЮСОМ БУДЕТ:
Опыт работы с Next.js или аналогичными фреймворками (SSR).
Опыт работы над проектами, связанными с визуализацией данных, аналитическими дашбордами.
Знание концепций UX/UI, взаимодействие с дизайнерами.
Базовые знания DevOps-инструментов (Docker, Kubernetes).
Опыт настройки Webpack, Babel.
УСЛОВИЯ:
Непрерывное развитие, возможность корпоративного обучения
Социальный пакет от работодателя
Стабильная работа в успешной компании

column1: Data Software Engineering Trainee,"ТОО Epam Kazakhstan (Эпам Казахстан),ТОО",Не указано,Не указано,"Details
If you have strong Python programming skills and want to start a career in Data Software Engineering (prev. Big Data), then this program is what you need.
Our learning path includes two stages, offering you a step-by-step approach to gaining in-depth knowledge in this direction. By participating, you will have the opportunity to:
Gain expertise in software development technologies and Git
Dive into the capabilities of the leading public cloud platforms
Explore the design, development and maintenance of large data-volume software systems
Learn large-scale data handling technologies (Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc.)
Training process
The program consists of two stages:

In the first stage, you will explore self-study materials at your convenience and complete assigned tasks with immediate automated feedback. Completing this stage usually takes ~3 months with ~10-12 hours of weekly engagement.

If you show good results and successfully pass a technical interview, we will invite you to the next stage. It usually lasts ~3 months and requires ~20 hours of weekly engagement. We will offer you a mentoring program with one-to-one meetings with production experts.
Upon program completion, you may be able to continue your career path according to demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.
What is required for training:
English speaking level from B2 (Upper-Intermediate) and higher
Strong Python programming skills
Practical experience in one of the additional languages (Java or Scala)
Solid knowledge of the Relational Database Management System (DBMS) theory
Good command of Structured Query Language (DML/DDL/DCL/TCL)
Theoretical knowledge of DWH/Data Lake and one of the visualization tools
Basic understanding of Linux, Docker and Kubernetes",не требуется,"Частичная занятость

Information Security Engineer,Astana International Exchange,"Нур-Султан (Астана), проспект Мангилик Ел, 55/19",Не указано,"AIX is currently seeking a highly motivated and experienced Information Security Engineer to join our dynamic IT team. This role will be crucial in maintaining and enhancing our security posture, with a strong emphasis on the practical application of security principles within our Microsoft Server 2019 environment and through our FortiGate firewall infrastructure. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of security best practices, be adept at troubleshooting and resolving security-related issues, and have a proactive approach to identifying and mitigating potential threats.
Responsibilities
Security Administration of Microsoft Server 2019:
Implement and manage security policies and configurations on Windows Servers, including Active Directory, Group Policy Objects (GPOs), and server hardening.
Monitor and analyze server security logs to identify suspicious activity and potential security incidents.
Administer and maintain server-based security tools and technologies (e.g., antivirus, endpoint detection and response).
Ensure timely patching and vulnerability management of Windows Server infrastructure.
Implement and manage secure configurations for server roles and features.
FortiGate Firewall Management:
Configure, manage, and maintain FortiGate firewalls, including rule creation, VPN configuration (IPSec, SSL VPN), web filtering, application control, and intrusion prevention systems (IPS).
Monitor firewall logs and alerts to identify and respond to security threats.
Implement and enforce firewall policies to control network access and protect internal resources.
Troubleshoot connectivity and security issues related to the firewall.
Perform regular firewall rule reviews and optimizations.
Threat Detection and Incident Response:
Participate in the identification, investigation, and resolution of security incidents.
Analyze security alerts and indicators of compromise (IOCs).
Assist in the development and implementation of incident response plans.
Vulnerability Management:
Conduct regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing (internal and external) in collaboration with third-party vendors or using internal tools.
Analyze vulnerability scan results and prioritize remediation efforts for Windows Servers and network devices (including FortiGate).
Track and report on the status of vulnerability remediation.
Security Policy and Procedure Development:
Contribute to the development, implementation, and maintenance of security policies, standards, and procedures.
Ensure adherence to security policies and regulatory compliance requirements.
Security Awareness and Training:
Assist in the development and delivery of security awareness training for employees.
Documentation and Reporting:
Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of security configurations, procedures, and incident responses.
Prepare regular security reports for management.
Collaboration:

Поддержка пользователей (1-я и 2-я линия):

Установка, обновление и удаление программного обеспечения.

Диагностика и устранение сетевых сбоев.

Участие в мониторинге и устранении инцидентов информационной безопасности.
Сопровождение процедур резервного копирования (по регламенту).

Ведение документации по ИТ-инфраструктуре, настройкам и инцидентам.
Участие в разработке и поддержке внутренних ИТ-регламентов и инструкций.
Ведение учёта ИТ-оборудования и лицензий.

Уверенные навыки работы с офисной техникой, ЛВС и периферийными устройствами.

Есть множество причин, почему нас выбирают, и, если вы действительно хотите, чтобы ваш профессиональный путь был разносторонним и осмысленным, если ваша мечта – стать частью яркого и многогранного сообщества, если вы горите желанием сделать что‑либо действительно значимое, сделайте правильный выбор.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.

Leader of Tech Loyalty Platform Tribe,Kapital Bank,Не указано,Не указано,"About BirEcoSystem

BirEcoSystem is a rapidly growing digital ecosystem, integrating e-commerce, fintech, banking, mobility, travel, and insurance services. Our goal is to create seamless and engaging user experiences through embedded financial services, including Bir ID, Bir Pay, Bir Bonus, Loans and BNPL solutions. We are building a unified platform that enables users to access all services with a single ID, leveraging a common reward system and data-driven personalization.
About the Role

As the Leader of Tech Loyalty Platform Tribe, you will be responsible for building and optimizing the Loyalty Engine and Bonus Integration Layer that powers our business loyalty programs. You will lead the development of scalable, high-performance solutions for processing transactions, event-based triggers, flexible rule configurations, and seamless partner integrations. Your role will be critical in ensuring a robust, modular, and extensible technology stack to support business needs.
Key Responsibilities
Architect and develop the loyalty engine, ensuring it efficiently processes transactions, triggers, and other events for rewards calculation and distribution.
Design and implement a flexible rules management system that allows loyalty configurations through an admin panel without developer intervention.
Build a scalable Bonus Integration Layer, enabling seamless interaction between different ecosystem services, merchants, and third-party partners.
Ensure real-time data processing and event-driven architecture, leveraging modern technologies for high availability and performance.
Lead a cross-functional engineering team, driving best practices in software development, DevOps, and data engineering.
Define and implement API-based integrations to connect loyalty services with various transaction sources, CRM, payment systems, and customer interaction points.
Oversee security, compliance, and fraud prevention within the loyalty platform.
Collaborate closely with Business Loyalty Tribe to align technical capabilities with business goals.
Evaluate and implement the right technology stack, ensuring scalability, maintainability, and future-proofing the platform.
Monitor and optimize system performance, ensuring high availability and low-latency processing of loyalty transactions.
Qualifications & Experience
Proven experience (7+ years) in leading engineering teams, with a strong focus on building in-house loyalty, rewards, or financial transaction platforms.
Deep expertise in event-driven architectures, transaction processing, and microservices.
Hands-on experience with technologies such as Kafka, Redis, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Kubernetes, and cloud-based infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Strong understanding of SDK, API development, data streaming, and integration best practices.
Experience in designing admin panel tools for dynamic rule management and real-time configuration.
Strong leadership skills with the ability to manage teams, drive engineering excellence, and align technical solutions with business needs.
Experience in fintech, banking, e-commerce, or large-scale transactional systems is highly preferred.
Solid understanding of security, compliance, and data protection in loyalty and financial ecosystems.
Why Join Us?
Lead the development of a next-generation loyalty platform in a fast-growing digital ecosystem.
Work on cutting-edge technologies with high-impact solutions for millions of customers.
Collaborate with top professionals in fintech, banking, and digital commerce.
Competitive salary, benefits, and career growth opportunities.
Join us in building the future of loyalty technology at Bir EcoSystem!",3–6 лет,"Полная занятость

Менеджер по продажам в интернет-магазин (со знанием казахского языка),Callmedia,Не указано,"до 500 000 ₸ за месяц, на руки","Менеджер по продажам в Callmedia – начни строить свою карьеру уже завтра!
О компании Callmedia:

Callmedia — международный аутсорсинговый колл-центр, который с 2011 года помогает людям находить качественные товары для здоровья и красоты. Мы сотрудничаем с ведущими производителями и ценим профессионализм, ответственность и желание работать.
Сейчас мы приглашаем в нашу команду менеджеров по продажам. Нам важен ваш опыт общения с людьми, ответственность и желание работать в стабильной компании.
Почему стоит выбрать нас:
- Стабильный доход: фиксированный оклад + бонусы от продаж. Месячный доход менеджеров до 500 000 тенге
- Гибкий график: 2/2, 5/2, 7/0 по 4, 6 или 8 часов в день - получится совмещать с семьёй и личными делами.
- Удаленная работа: без потерь времени на дорогу – работайте из дома.
- Щедрые бонусы: премии, подарки, участие в реферальных программах
- Быстрое и понятное обучение: 2 дня теория и после начинается оплачиваемая стажировки
- Стабильные выплаты: 2 раза в месяц стабильно и без задержек
- Карьерный рост: 85% руководителей начинали с этой должности!
- Поддержка на всех этапах: мы всегда рядом и готовы помочь в освоении работы.
Чем ты будешь заниматься:

Вакансия открыта в отдел BIG Data: здесь мы работаем с VIP-клиентами, которые совершили последнюю покупку более 2 месяцев назад. Акцент на индивидуальный подход, предложение новых продуктов, эксклюзивных акций и специальных условий.
Основные задачи:
- Обработка теплых клиентов (без поиска клиентов – база уже готова!).
- Узнавать потребности клиента и помогать выбрать подходящий продукт. Наша продукция - категория здоровье и красота
- Ведение клиентских данных в простой и понятной CRM-системе.
Что нужно от тебя:
- Грамотная речь, коммуникабельность и желание работать с людьми.
- Ноутбук/компьютер (ОС WINDOWS не ниже 10 версии, от 4 ГБ), гарнитура, высокоскоростной интернет (5 МБ в обе стороны).
- Желание зарабатывать и работать в стабильной компании.
- Возможность работать в тишине, где никто и ничто не будет отвлекать.
Присоединяйтесь к команде Callmedia! Откликайтесь прямо сейчас – стабильность и высокий доход ждут вас!

Training process

Upon program completion, you may be able to continue your career path according to demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

English speaking level from B2 (Upper-Intermediate) and higher

ТОО Ёлва - это консалтинговая компания со статусом ""Золотого партнёра Microsoft"" и компетенцией ""Крупные Корпоративные Внедрения 1С-Битрикс"", специализирующаяся на оказании профессиональных услуг по разработке, внедрению и сопровождению CRM и BPM-систем — Microsoft и Битрикс24, систем аналитики Power BI.

Мы предлагаем клиентам широкий перечень услуг и сервисов, связанных с процессами автоматизации деятельности организации. Нашими клиентами являются крупнейшие казахские компании в финансовом секторе и промышленности, а также государственные организации.
Я хочу, чтобы наша команда отдела консалтинга росла и стала еще круче, поэтому мы открываем вакансию стажер-аналитик Битрикс24
Тебе предстоит:
Изучать Битрикс24 и методологию внедрения продукта, сдавать экзамены на знание продукта и получать различные компетенции

интервьюировать Заказчика, собирать и анализировать требования
разбираться, как реализовать требования Заказчика в Битрикс24 (совместно с функциональным архитектором и командой)
готовить и согласовывать проектную документацию (функциональный дизайн, задание на разработку)
настраивать Битрикс24
ставить задачи программистам на доработку системы
тестировать
сдавать работы заказчику
Наши пожелания к кандидату:
Знание теории управления требованиями (что такое требования к ИС, какие типы требований существуют, как собирать требования и т.п.)

Working on proactive and reactive compliance related projects: helping clients to identify and prevent fraud, bribery and corruption

Reviewing and drafting company policy and procedures to reduce / mitigate fraud, bribery and corruption
Designing ideas and plans for clients to improve their compliance culture and procedures
Conducting interviews – to gather information on processes, with potential witnesses to issues and potential suspects
Preparing draft reports in Russian and English.
Requirements:
Higher education
Over four years of relevant experience
Attention to detail and an inquisitive mind
Good analytical and communication skills
Flexibility and a commitment to seeing a task through to completion
A commitment to quality
A willingness to travel
Fluent English and Russian (Kazakh is also preferable but not essential)

Data Software Engineering Trainee,"ТОО Epam Kazakhstan (Эпам Казахстан),ТОО",Не указано,Не указано,"Details
If you have strong Python programming skills and want to start a career in Data Software Engineering (prev. Big Data), then this program is what you need.
Our learning path includes two stages, offering you a step-by-step approach to gaining in-depth knowledge in this direction. By participating, you will have the opportunity to:
Gain expertise in software development technologies and Git
Dive into the capabilities of the leading public cloud platforms
Explore the design, development and maintenance of large data-volume software systems
Learn large-scale data handling technologies (Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc.)
Training process
The program consists of two stages:

In the first stage, you will explore self-study materials at your convenience and complete assigned tasks with immediate automated feedback. Completing this stage usually takes ~3 months with ~10-12 hours of weekly engagement.

If you show good results and successfully pass a technical interview, we will invite you to the next stage. It usually lasts ~3 months and requires ~20 hours of weekly engagement. We will offer you a mentoring program with one-to-one meetings with production experts.
Upon program completion, you may be able to continue your career path according to demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.
What is required for training:
English speaking level from B2 (Upper-Intermediate) and higher
Strong Python programming skills
Practical experience in one of the additional languages (Java or Scala)
Solid knowledge of the Relational Database Management System (DBMS) theory
Good command of Structured Query Language (DML/DDL/DCL/TCL)
Theoretical knowledge of DWH/Data Lake and one of the visualization tools
Basic understanding of Linux, Docker and Kubernetes",не требуется,"Частичная занятость

Every day, more than 80 000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars.
Could you be the full-time Direct Buyer in Astana we’re looking for?
Your future role

Take on a new challenge and apply your procurement expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll report to Procurement Manager Dina Kalushpayeva, and work alongside passionate and inquisitive teammates.

You'll guarantee full coverage for production needs. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business (Quality, Supply Chain, Engineering etc.), contribute to budget optimization and much more.
You’ll specifically take care of all the contracts for materials within scope, but also support colleagues with any issues around suppliers.
We’ll look to you for:
Ensuring savings for the rolling stock budget.
Conduct sourcing and contracting process strictly adhering to Alstom policies and processes.
Negotiation of cost reduction with suppliers.
Full Sourcing support for any identified project activities / requirements, including deputizing for the Unit Sourcing Manager.
Regular benchmarking and maintenance of market intelligence to validate costs and drive cost reduction activities where appropriate.
Acting as an ambassador for Alstom and the Sourcing function both internally and externally.
All about you
We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role:
Extensive experience in sourcing.
Strong communication skills in English, Russian and Kazakh.
Advanced skills in Excel.
Things you’ll enjoy
Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also:
Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines
Contribute to innovative projects
Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries
Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning
Progress towards expert or leadership role
Enjoy our corporate shuttle bus
NB! This is a temporary contract for one year. However based on your performance continuation is highly likely.

You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you!
Important to note

As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 63 countries we operate in. Recruiting Manager/Recruiter,ООО Visatier Ltd,Не указано,Не указано,"Since the day of the foundation, Visa Tier has become one of the leading British companies specializing in residence and citizenship by investment programs. Back in the days, we started the immigration programs in the UK and currently we have extended successful portfolios also in the US, Cyprus, Malta, Portugal, Ireland and we are planning to expand further. As the business continuously evolves in terms of immigration programs, size of the deals and significant increase of potential clients, Visa Tier is eager to enlarge the current sales team.

Visa Tier offers a complete suite of immigration programs allowing clients to expand their businesses, investment portfolio and support their families. We work in partnership with the solicitors and government immigration teams to be fully compliant with the local laws and maintain our 100% acceptance rate.
We are currently looking for a proactive and people-oriented specialist to help us to build a strong and motivated team.
Responsibilities:
Full-cycle recruitment: from drafting job descriptions to onboarding
Managing multiple open positions simultaneously.
Posting job openings on relevant platforms including international sources
Conducting initial interviews and assessing candidates based on key competencies
Maintaining candidate databases and reporting on recruitment funnels
Collaborating with team leads to clarify job requirements and profiles
Participating in the development of the company’s employer brand (optional)
Supporting new employees during the onboarding process
Desired skills:
1+ year of experience in recruitment (experience in a specific field like Sales, Finance as well as international recruiting experience is a plus)
Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Ability to build rapport with candidates quickly
Proactive, organized, and result-driven
Familiarity with modern sourcing tools and platforms (hh.ru, indeed.com, Telegram, LinkedIn, funnel tracking, etc.)
What we offer:
Competitive fixed compensation package + KPI
Being part of a team of only highly skilled and experienced professionals
International multicultural environment
Work closely with other departments to continuously evolve the product and business
Remote setup, work from anywhere
Why Visa Tier:

Visa Tier - people and culture. We always invest in our team and we believe your personality & soft skills are more important than just several hard competencies. We care about all of you, your background, what makes you tick, your reality, and your diversity!
Visa Tier - growth. We take on the challenges ahead and keep up with an ever-changing environment, becoming the best professional version of ourselves with no hidden agenda.
Visa Tier - Innovator. We live in a rapid changing environment and are making our way into it. You will find a result-driven space where you can develop your best ideas.

If you are ready for a career move, please send your CV & cover letter (please mention what motivates you to change your career path, how you are upgrading your knowledge & skills and how your experience & values can bring more business and long term partnerships).

Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. All personal data collected for recruitment purposes.",1–3 года,Полная занятость,График: 5/2,Рабочие часы: 8,Формат работы: удалённо,26 апреля 2025,https://hh.kz/vacancy/119434832,Английский — C1 — Продвинутый
Senior Consultant - Forensic - FAS,Deloitte DKU,Не указано,Не указано,"Your Business Unit:

Deloitte Forensic Services helps clients to identify fraud, bribery, corruption and losses, including asset misappropriation, employee fraud, compliance breaches or unethical conduct, and to manage the consequences of actions undertaken by dishonest employees through the development of efficient internal controls aimed at preventing and mitigating these risks.

Our professionals also help clients to design efficient ethics and compliance programmes and be in line with global best practices. We advise our clients in litigation / disputes with their commercial partners to enable them to resolve disputes as effectively as possible, supported by reliable and independent expert evidence.
Role

The role is a remarkable opportunity to enhance and develop your professional skills. You will take part in fraud investigations that range from employee misconduct and diversion of company assets to large scale multi-jurisdictional fraud.
Your role will directly involve:
Working on proactive and reactive compliance related projects: helping clients to identify and prevent fraud, bribery and corruption
Reviewing and analysing financial and other documents to identify potentially suspicious transactions
Reviewing and drafting company policy and procedures to reduce / mitigate fraud, bribery and corruption
Designing ideas and plans for clients to improve their compliance culture and procedures
Conducting interviews – to gather information on processes, with potential witnesses to issues and potential suspects
Preparing draft reports in Russian and English.
Requirements:
Higher education
Over four years of relevant experience
Attention to detail and an inquisitive mind
Good analytical and communication skills
Flexibility and a commitment to seeing a task through to completion
A commitment to quality
A willingness to travel
Fluent English and Russian (Kazakh is also preferable but not essential)

column1: QA engineer,ИП Андреева Руслана,Не указано,Не указано,"Мы являемся IT-компанией, специализирующейся на разработке решений iGaming и оптимизации бизнес-процессов. Наши продукты не только привлекают пользователей, но и помогают предприятиям более эффективно достигать своих целей.

В связи с расширением мы ищем QA engineer, который присоединится к команде профессионалов и поможет обеспечить качество наших продуктов.

Внимание к деталям, аналитическое мышление, системное мышление.

Менеджер по продажам в интернет-магазин (со знанием казахского языка),Callmedia,Не указано,"до 500 000 ₸ за месяц, на руки","Менеджер по продажам в Callmedia – начни строить свою карьеру уже завтра!
О компании Callmedia:

Callmedia — международный аутсорсинговый колл-центр, который с 2011 года помогает людям находить качественные товары для здоровья и красоты. Мы сотрудничаем с ведущими производителями и ценим профессионализм, ответственность и желание работать.
Сейчас мы приглашаем в нашу команду менеджеров по продажам. Нам важен ваш опыт общения с людьми, ответственность и желание работать в стабильной компании.
Почему стоит выбрать нас:
- Стабильный доход: фиксированный оклад + бонусы от продаж. Месячный доход менеджеров до 500 000 тенге
- Гибкий график: 2/2, 5/2, 7/0 по 4, 6 или 8 часов в день - получится совмещать с семьёй и личными делами.
- Удаленная работа: без потерь времени на дорогу – работайте из дома.
- Щедрые бонусы: премии, подарки, участие в реферальных программах
- Быстрое и понятное обучение: 2 дня теория и после начинается оплачиваемая стажировки
- Стабильные выплаты: 2 раза в месяц стабильно и без задержек
- Карьерный рост: 85% руководителей начинали с этой должности!
- Поддержка на всех этапах: мы всегда рядом и готовы помочь в освоении работы.
Чем ты будешь заниматься:

Вакансия открыта в отдел BIG Data: здесь мы работаем с VIP-клиентами, которые совершили последнюю покупку более 2 месяцев назад. Акцент на индивидуальный подход, предложение новых продуктов, эксклюзивных акций и специальных условий.
Основные задачи:
- Обработка теплых клиентов (без поиска клиентов – база уже готова!).
- Узнавать потребности клиента и помогать выбрать подходящий продукт. Наша продукция - категория здоровье и красота
- Ведение клиентских данных в простой и понятной CRM-системе.
Что нужно от тебя:
- Грамотная речь, коммуникабельность и желание работать с людьми.
- Ноутбук/компьютер (ОС WINDOWS не ниже 10 версии, от 4 ГБ), гарнитура, высокоскоростной интернет (5 МБ в обе стороны).
- Желание зарабатывать и работать в стабильной компании.
- Возможность работать в тишине, где никто и ничто не будет отвлекать.
Присоединяйтесь к команде Callmedia! Откликайтесь прямо сейчас – стабильность и высокий доход ждут вас!

The opportunity

As Assurance Manager, you'll manage assurance engagements by defining the audit strategy in consultation with the senior manager/partner, and executing it in compliance with EY's policies and protocols.
When required, you'll personally execute complex audit procedures and lead teams or parts of teams on engagements, depending on the size of the engagement.

You'll actively establish, maintain and strengthen internal and external relationships and confirm that work delivered to clients is of a high quality. As part of this, you'll anticipate and identify risks and escalate issues, as appropriate. As an influential member of the team, you'll help to create a positive learning culture and will coach and counsel junior team members and help them to develop.
Your key responsibilities
Client responsibilities
Manage the delivery of assurance engagements
Assist in managing the financial aspects of engagements by organizing staffing, tracking fees and communicating issues to project leaders
Participate in business development initiatives
Build strong internal relationships within EY Assurance and across other services.
People responsibilities
Develop people through effectively supervising, coaching and mentoring staff
Conduct performance reviews and contribute to performance feedback for staff
Contribute to people initiatives including recruiting, retaining and training Assurance professionals
Contribute to the maintenance of an educational program to continually develop personal skills of staff
Understand and follow workplace policies and procedures.
Skills and attributes for success
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong drive to excel professionally, and to guide and motivate others
Advanced written and verbal communication skills
Dedicated, innovative, resourceful, analytical and able to work under pressure
Foster an efficient, innovative and team-oriented work environment.
To qualify for the role you must have
Thorough knowledge of current auditing techniques
Minimum five years relevant work experience
Experience of the entire audit process
ACCA certification
Understanding of IFRS and local GAAP
Detailed understanding of risk-based auditing and risk and control strategies
Understanding of Quality & Risk Management (Q&RM) procedures
Compliance with and understanding of regulatory requirements
Strong written and verbal communication, presentation, client service and technical writing skills in English and Russian.
Ideally, you also have
Knowledge of business trends, emerging technical and industry developments.
What we look for

Highly motivated individuals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritize shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. An effective communicator, you'll be a confident leader equipped with strong people management skills and a genuine passion to make things happen in a dynamic organization. If you're ready to take on a wide range of responsibilities, and are committed to seeking out new ways to make a difference, this role is for you.
What we offer
Continuous learning: You'll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next
Success as defined by you: We'll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way
Transformative leadership: We'll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs

Master the ASP.NET framework and its practical uses in web development

Training process

Upon successful graduation, we will consider you for open positions based on your demonstrated skills and available opportunities at EPAM.

English level from Intermediate (B1) and higher
Solid knowledge of the .NET platform

Why this role matters

develop features with React + TypeScript and Next.js (SSR / ISR)
compose reusable components with Ant Design and Tailwind CSS, extending our design‑token system

О компании Callmedia:

Callmedia — международный аутсорсинговый колл-центр, который с 2011 года помогает людям находить качественные товары для здоровья и красоты. Мы сотрудничаем с ведущими производителями и ценим профессионализм, ответственность и желание работать.
Сейчас мы приглашаем в нашу команду менеджеров по продажам. Нам важен ваш опыт общения с людьми, ответственность и желание работать в стабильной компании.
Почему стоит выбрать нас:
- Стабильный доход: фиксированный оклад + бонусы от продаж. Месячный доход менеджеров до 500 000 тенге
- Гибкий график: 2/2, 5/2, 7/0 по 4, 6 или 8 часов в день - получится совмещать с семьёй и личными делами.
- Удаленная работа: без потерь времени на дорогу – работайте из дома.
- Щедрые бонусы: премии, подарки, участие в реферальных программах
- Быстрое и понятное обучение: 2 дня теория и после начинается оплачиваемая стажировки
- Стабильные выплаты: 2 раза в месяц стабильно и без задержек
- Карьерный рост: 85% руководителей начинали с этой должности!
- Поддержка на всех этапах: мы всегда рядом и готовы помочь в освоении работы.
Чем ты будешь заниматься:

Вакансия открыта в отдел BIG Data: здесь мы работаем с VIP-клиентами, которые совершили последнюю покупку более 2 месяцев назад. Акцент на индивидуальный подход, предложение новых продуктов, эксклюзивных акций и специальных условий.
Основные задачи:
- Обработка теплых клиентов (без поиска клиентов – база уже готова!).
- Узнавать потребности клиента и помогать выбрать подходящий продукт. Наша продукция - категория здоровье и красота
- Ведение клиентских данных в простой и понятной CRM-системе.
Что нужно от тебя:
- Грамотная речь, коммуникабельность и желание работать с людьми.
- Ноутбук/компьютер (ОС WINDOWS не ниже 10 версии, от 4 ГБ), гарнитура, высокоскоростной интернет (5 МБ в обе стороны).
- Желание зарабатывать и работать в стабильной компании.
- Возможность работать в тишине, где никто и ничто не будет отвлекать.
Присоединяйтесь к команде Callmedia! Откликайтесь прямо сейчас – стабильность и высокий доход ждут вас!

column1: Junior QA Automation Engineer (Java),Andersen,Не указано,Не указано,"Andersen, an international IT company, invites a Junior QA Automation Engineer (Java) to work on a project in the field of FinTech for one of our German customers.

The customer is a world leader in insurance and B2B2C support, which offers global solutions that span international health and life insurance, travel insurance, cars, and their service. The company is dedicated to delivering world-class, agile, and sustainable IT solutions, driving full-spectrum digitalization.
The project is the development of API microservices according to Insurance reference architecture.
Responsibilities:
Creating new E2E API autotests and supporting existing ones.
Conducting Feature Testing (manual).
Maintaining automated E2E regression runs - setup and results analysis.
Creating checklists and test scenarios.
Working with service documentation and specification in OpenAPI format.
Creating and maintaining test data using API and dedicated service.
Validating incoming bugs: reproducing, investigation, clarification.
Extending and maintaining custom QA libraries.
Must-haves:
Experience as a QA Automation Engineer for 6+ months.
Strong REST API knowledge (definition, principles, purpose).
Experience with Java 11.
Experience in working with Postman.
Knowledge of test artifacts and test design techniques.
Understanding of bugs (definition, attributes, lifecycle, difference with Incidents).
Common knowledge of Scrum ceremonies and feature lifecycle.
Level of English – from Intermediate+ and above.
Reasons why this job would be interesting to you:

Experience in teamwork with leaders in FinTech, Healthcare, Retail, Telecom, and others. Andersen cooperates with such businesses as Samsung, Siemens, Johnson & Johnson, BNP Paribas, Ryanair, Mercedes, TUI, Verivox, Allianz, T-Systems, etc.

Job conditions – you can work both fully remotely and from the office or can choose a hybrid variant
Guarantee of professional, financial, and career growth! The company has introduced systems of mentoring and adaptation for each new employee
The opportunity to earn additional up to 1,000 EUR per month by participating in the company's activities
Access to the corporate training portal, where the entire knowledge base of the company is collected and which is constantly updated
Bright corporate life (parties / pizza days / PlayStation / fruits / coffee / snacks / movies)
Certification compensation (AWS, PMP, etc)
Referral program
English courses
Private health insurance and compensation for sports activities.

Sales Specialist (Closer),ООО Visatier Ltd,Не указано,Не указано,"Since the day of the foundation, Visa Tier has become one of the leading British companies specializing in residence and citizenship by investment programs. Back in the days, we started the immigration programs in the UK and currently we have extended successful portfolios also in the US, Cyprus, Malta, Portugal, Ireland and we are planning to expand further. As the business continuously evolves in terms of immigration programs, size of the deals and significant increase of potential clients, Visa Tier is eager to enlarge the current sales team.

Visa Tier offers a complete suite of immigration programs allowing clients to expand their businesses, investment portfolio and support their families. We work in partnership with the solicitors and government immigration teams to be fully compliant with the local laws and maintain our 100% acceptance rate.

We are seeking a confident, persuasive, and highly motivated Closer to join our fast-paced, high-performing team. You’ll play a pivotal role in converting warm leads into paying clients by delivering impactful consultations, building trust-based relationships, and guiding prospects through a smooth and high-converting sales process.
Responsibilities:
Conduct in-depth diagnostic sessions to understand client needs, goals, and pain points.
Deliver clear, structured product presentations with a strong value proposition.
Identify client pain points and recommend the most suitable solution from our portfolio based on their needs.
Qualify leads based on readiness and alignment with the offer.
Ensure timely contract signing and follow-up on payments.
Maintain communication with clients post-sale to build trust and ensure smooth onboarding.
Desired skills:
1–2+ years of experience in sales, ideally in high-ticket, consultative, or B2C service-based sales.
Experience with discovery/strategy calls, objection handling, and closing deals over the phone or video is a strong plus.
Proven track record in high-ticket sales or consultative selling.
Confidence and clarity when presenting premium offers.
Excellent communication, persuasion, and rapport-building skills.
Emotional intelligence and active listening — ability to uncover true client pain points.
Goal-oriented with strong follow-up discipline.
Proactive, organized, and result-driven
Comfortable working in fast-paced, high-performance environments.
Fluent in English

column1: Аналитик,ТОО Шалхар Бастау,"Шымкент, улица Мадели кожа, 45",Не указано,"Компания Шалхар Бастау — это передовой лидер в сфере строительства и ремонта дорог, а также прокладки инженерных систем по всей территории Казахстана. Мы активно участвуем в государственных и частных тендерах, реализуя проекты самого высокого уровня сложности и качества.

Мы ищем талантливого и мотивированного Аналитика, чтобы усилить нашу команду и продолжить успешную реализацию амбициозных проектов. Если вам нравится работать с большим объемом информации, у вас аналитическое мышление и с цифрами на ""ТЫ"" то эта вакансия точно для Вас!
Отклики принимаются до 20 апреля
Что мы ожидаем: точные и четкие аналитические отчет, помогающие компании принимать верные решения.
Основные обязанности:
Анализ и мониторинг тендерных площадок для оценки прибыльности участия.
Оценка финансовых и экономических рисков по проектам компании.
Сбор и анализ данных по сметам, себестоимости и рентабельности проектов.
Разработка прогнозов по бюджетированию и затратам.
Подготовка аналитических отчетов и презентаций для руководства.
Анализ эффективности подрядчиков и поставщиков.
Разработка рекомендаций по снижению издержек и повышению прибыльности.
Что мы предлагаем:
Период испытательного срока - 2 месяца
Конкурентоспособная заработная плата.
Официальное трудоустройство и полный социальный пакет.
Стабильность и долгосрочная перспектива работы в компании, которая зарекомендовала себя как надежный партнер.
Повышение квалификации и обучение за счет компании.
Возможность влиять на развитие компании и достигать высоких результатов в своей карьере (карьерный рост и возможность реализации).
Требования:
Опыт работы от 2-хлет в аналитике (строительство, финансы).
Умение работать с Excel, Power BI, 1С (уверенный пользователь).
Высокая внимательность к деталям, способность работать с большим объемом информации.
Аналитический склад ума, высокая степень самоорганизации.

Consultants are responsible for providing a tax registration number/statement issued by the tax authorities for individual entrepreneurs where applicable and are responsible for paying any taxes and Social Fund payments due.
*Consultancy contract will be offered until 31 March 2026*

Applicants must fully meet the minimum qualification requirements. Applicants should submit a covering letter outlining why they are suited for the role and motivation for the role and curriculum vitae (CV) by Sunday 11 May 2025, with the subject ‘AELLCA MEL Manager recruitment’ in the title. The British Council does not consider CVs without a covering letter and only short-listed candidates will be contacted.
About the programme

The project Accelerating English Language Learning in Central Asia focuses on the improvement of the quality of Initial English Language Teacher Education (IELTE) across the region, the modernisation of the Continuing Professional Development (CPD) policies and practices, and promotion of inclusive educational practices and policies across the education system. The aim of the project is for English language teachers in Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan and Turkmenistan, to become more effective in teaching English at all levels. This should ultimately boost student attainment and result in more inclusive educational systems, driving improved student attainment and contributing significantly to the development of human capital and economic growth in Central Asian countries.
MONITORING, EVALUATION AND LEARNING

Working closely with the Wider Europe Regional MEL manager, the management team and project partners and contractors – on the AELLCA project, the MEL Manager will be responsible for the programme monitoring and ensuring high quality and timely MEL inputs and outputs. She/he will ensure that the project maintains its strategic vision and that its activities result in the achievement of its intended outputs in a cost effective and timely manner.
SCOPE OF WORK
Reference to the programme Theory of Change and Result Framework
This assignment contributes to the programme intermediate outcomes across the work streams, with details specified within project proposal, Result Framework and MEL approach.
Main Tasks and Responsibilities

The British Council’s WE Regional MEL Manager and AELLCA MEL Manager are responsible for the implementation of Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning across the programme, according to the broad division of responsibilities below (as outlined in the project)
The MEL Coordinator is accountable and responsible for:
Developing and maintaining an effective monitoring system that responds to information needs of the Client and the British Council
Maintaining and managing the MEL database and providing timely, accurate and updated information on the programme indicators for monthly, quarterly and other internal and Client reporting
Supporting evidence informed programme decision making and providing regular feedback to the project management team
Coordinate with programme partners, contractors and management team on all MEL related activities and deliverables

Monitoring and reviewing all project activities and overall progress towards achieving the programme outputs and outcomes against the indicators in the Result Framework and in line with the Theory of Change
Participating in periodical reflection events, annual programme reviews and planning workshops and assist the Project Management team in preparing relevant reports
Supplying and instructing the project team on using and distributing MEL instruments
Providing support to contractors and grantees in developing/strengthening their monitoring, evaluation and reporting function, ensuring that minimum data quality is met
Developing and strengthening monitoring, evaluation and learning procedures
Ensuring that key British Council’s MEL standards and procedures are in place and embedded in the programme
Providing input and updating information related to programme outputs for relevant marketing and communication opportunities
REQUIREMENTS
Experience and Education:
Degree level or higher qualification or equivalent experience in specialist area relevant to job.
Excellent English writing and presentation skills
Minimum 4 years' relevant experience of managing and delivering complex MEL activities
Experience in managing MEL within a large and complex organisation.
Demonstrable experience in providing expert advice and guidance on MEL
Experience of working with teams across the region
Advanced Excel skills are essential
Proven ability to work with and analyse both qualitative and quantitative data
Strong communication skills and ability to work with diverse team and partners
Desirable:
Experience of working in a global organisation
Experience of managing MEL for large-scale donor funded programmes (e.g. Foreign and Commonwealth Office, EU).
A good knowledge of the English teaching landscape across the Central Asia

Language and skills: Excellent English writing and presentation skills (C1 or higher). column1: CORE WORK ACTIVITIES
Managing Quality Assurance Goals
• Coaches managers on adopting the Total Quality Management leadership style.
• Conducts monthly audit to ensure compliance with company and brand standards
• Makes and executes the necessary decisions to keep property moving forward toward achievement of goals.
• Directs property quality efforts to address critical customer requirements.
• Assists with regional and/or company-wide implementation of company best practices.
• Facilitates process improvement teams, assuring use of the systematic processes, and improvement is achievable and measurable.
Managing Quality Tools
• Ensures that management practices at all levels are aligned with quality tools by providing training in quality sciences.
• Uses data collection methods to compile, display, track, and analyze defect trends.

• Analyzes issues and identifies trends.
Managing the Guest Experience
• Reviews guest feedback with leadership team and ensures appropriate corrective action is taken.
• Responds to and handles guest problems and complaints.
• Stays visible and interfaces with customers on a regular basis to obtain feedback on quality of product, service levels and overall satisfaction.

HR Manager,Nazarbayev University,Не указано,Не указано,"Company Description
School of Engineering and Digital Sciences, Nazarbayev University
Job Description
The Manager performs the following duties:
1) conducts HR records management, issues labor and social leave for employees of the academic, administrative, administrative-academic staff of the School

2) prepares and submits reports on reimbursement of expenses to the Department of Accounting and Finance Reporting for the faculty of the School in accordance with social policy, in particular reports on home leaves and others
3) in case of detection of non-standard cases during home leaves, submits such issues to the meeting of the travel working committee.
4) prepares the necessary documentation, organizes and conducts informative presentations on business trips, conference expenses and membership fees for the employees of the School
5) provides advisory and methodological assistance to School staff on issues related to business trips, vacations, conferences and membership fees within his/her competence

6) processes requests for business trips, conferences and membership fees from the employees of the School, provides consultations on the possibility of filling out the necessary documentation for the relevant expenses
7) prepares requests for the payment of daily allowances and submits business trip reports of employees to the Department of Finance and Accounting
8) updates the Department of Internationalization's table with information on foreign nationals crossing Kazakhstan's border after their vacations and business trips

9) provides advisory and methodological assistance to the employees of the School on health insurance issues, namely: collects applications for VHI and sends them to the Health and Well-being Department, sends newly arrived foreign workers for medical examination, assists the Health and Well-being Department in organizing an annual compulsory medical examination, sends applications for VHI to the Health and Well-being Department for administrative employees who have passed their probationary period

10) prepares and maintains the necessary documentation on service contracts of the faculty of the School (budget formation, preparation of draft contracts, timely signing of acts of completed works, reporting, submission of documents to the Department of Accounting and Finance Reporting, administers payment orders for services)
11) ensures timely introduction of employees to the acts of the Employer in terms according to the Labor Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan
12) provides assistance in the adaptation of the accepted administrative and academic and administrative staff of the School, including on issues related to the Social Policy of the University
13) participates in the preparation of personnel documents of the employees of the School for submission to the University archive
14) if necessary, carries out the input of temporary disability sheets into the accounting system for the correct payroll calculation
15) if necessary, issues certificates from the place of work
16) is responsible for the safety of documents within the supervised area
17) maintains correspondence within the scope of his/her functional duties
18) participates in the processes of identification, assessment, management, and monitoring of risks within the supervised area
19) performs duties (acts in a position) of the HR Specialist during his/her temporary absence (for up to one month)
20) timely and properly executes the tasks of the line manager and the University`s management
21) observes the requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan and internal documents of the University
22) is responsible for exercising the labor and performance discipline

23) is responsible for ensuring the integrity of official documents, and prevention of the disclosure or leakage of confidential and business information, as well as information of restricted access in accordance with the legislation, Charter and internal documents of the Employer

24) in case of dismissal, is responsible for timely transfer of all paper documentation, digital information, inventory to another employee as instructed by the line manager (to be certified by the act of acceptance-transfer).

Higher professional education, preferably in higher education institutions with English language teaching.
Priority areas of specialisation:
- management
- psychology
- human resource management
- business administration
- international relations/law
- jurisprudence

Minimum of three years. Minimum 1 year with a master's degree in the relevant field
Knowledge
- Knowledge of the labor legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan
- knowledge of processes and tools in the field of HR records management
- knowledge of MS Office, Excel, PowerPoint
- fluency in English, Kazakh and Russian languages
Skills
- Ability to work with a large amount of information
- analytical skills
- skills in developing rules, policies, contracts, and other documents
- skills in writing analytical and informational notes
Additional information
Other requirements
- Commitment to the goals and values of the University
- ability to work independently and in a team
- communication skills
- responsibility
- stress resistance
- proactivity
- interpersonal communication skills
- ability to work in a multicultural environment
Contract duration:
This position is offered to cover the maternity leave of an employee.
Recruitment and selection process

Recruitment and selection at Nazarbayev University include the following process: preliminary selection based on experience and qualifications, assessments (e.g. technical skills/capabilities, aptitude, personality, work samples, in-basket exercises, and informal interviews), and motivation.
Formal interviews form the final stage of the selection process.
They are typically based on organizational values and behaviors and conducted in English.

Your main responsibility is to manage/support all activities related to sales & marketing for the full TIS product group in the CIS region by interacting with several distributors in 11 countries. In addition, you interact with healthcare professionals by being present during Cathlab procedures to make sure you understand the needs of the end users.
1.Job Responsibilities

Product knowledge and training internal and external customersEnsure a detailed and up to date product knowledge.Define personal training needs and consequently attend product trainings and get the yearly recertification.Promote features and benefits of all products
column2: implement the defined appropriate product and technical supportIdentify, give and set-up training programmes for external and internal customers (distributors and end-users)

column1: 2.Achievement sales targets

Support all sales activities for his/her product group (including actively supporting the business partners in realising the agreed business objectives)Assists the Line Manager in analysing all problems, related to his/her product group, propose and plan corrective actions in order to reach the objectives and targetsAssist sales manager to focus on specific products of the business and the sales development.Assist and follow-up on scientific studiesLiaise with BU/Inventory Planning/Customer Service to manage back-order situation within his/her product groupGive the necessary support for a timely and correct submission of the necessary documents related to tenders
3.Expand sales portfolio

Implement defined strategies and develop tactics to improve the sales and profitability of his/her product group together with the Line manager.Facilitates implementation of business plans and marketing strategies for the area to increase market penetration or market share where appropriate.Maintain excellent relation with external official parties, authorities and organisationsTogether with Product Managers launch new products.Gathers and shares info with Line Manager and Market Development Manager concerning market and product developments (including but not limited to market data like market sizes, market tendencies, competitor’s products, activities, pricing policies, and business organisation).Is responsible for the product forecasting for the region.Ensures tender support and preparation of technical files for tenders and reimbursement.
4.Increase brand preference, presence on the market

Identify and maintain excellent relations with Key Opinion Leaders and ‘rising stars’ from the region and actively use them in further local promotion of the product group.Works closely with Sales team, Marketing and Clinical Departments to develop strategies for market access and development at the account level and to maximize customer programs.Participation in congressesAssures implementation of the clinical programs, registries and studies in the core regions/customer segments/accounts
column2: Ensures frequent clinical/ product support in cathlabs.

column1: 5.General Reporting
Monitor and update the (production) forecast.Maintain and update CRM (distribution lists)
Profile Description

You have a Bachelor or Master degree in Medical or Paramedical orientation or Business. You have minimum 3 to 5 years of relevant working experience in similar position working for a large distributor or an original manufacturer in medical device industry. You possess also some good practical knowledge of Sales & Marketing techniques. You can vary your communication depending on the target audience and you can give impactful presentations. You feel comfortable spending time in a Cathlab during procedures. You enjoy working in an international environment
column2: you are fluent in English and Russian,(written and spoken) any additional language is a plus
column3: You are recognized as a flexible team player, while being able to work independently, prioritizing you own work and maintaining the confidentiality of information.You demonstrate a positive attitude, are pro-active, have excellent organizational, communication and interpersonal skills and can work under pressure and within short time constraintsYou are flexible to travel intensively internationally, up to 50%.

column1: Offer

We offer you an exciting position as Product Specialist in an international medical devices company. You will have the opportunity to contribute to the development and promotion of our highly innovative products. We are Appreciative of others, Guided by our mission, Empathetic to patients, Committed to excellence and Striving for innovation. We also strongly value lifelong learning. You will have access to a high quality training program, including classroom trainings in our HR in Leuven, Belgium, and a very broad range of e-learning content to increase your technical knowledge and improve your soft skills. Менеджер по продажам в интернет-магазин (со знанием казахского языка),Callmedia,Не указано,"до 500 000 ₸ за месяц, на руки","Менеджер по продажам в Callmedia – начни строить свою карьеру уже завтра!
О компании Callmedia:

Callmedia — международный аутсорсинговый колл-центр, который с 2011 года помогает людям находить качественные товары для здоровья и красоты. Мы сотрудничаем с ведущими производителями и ценим профессионализм, ответственность и желание работать.
Сейчас мы приглашаем в нашу команду менеджеров по продажам. Нам важен ваш опыт общения с людьми, ответственность и желание работать в стабильной компании.
Почему стоит выбрать нас:
- Стабильный доход: фиксированный оклад + бонусы от продаж. Месячный доход менеджеров до 500 000 тенге
- Гибкий график: 2/2, 5/2, 7/0 по 4, 6 или 8 часов в день - получится совмещать с семьёй и личными делами.
- Удаленная работа: без потерь времени на дорогу – работайте из дома.
- Щедрые бонусы: премии, подарки, участие в реферальных программах
- Быстрое и понятное обучение: 2 дня теория и после начинается оплачиваемая стажировки
- Стабильные выплаты: 2 раза в месяц стабильно и без задержек
- Карьерный рост: 85% руководителей начинали с этой должности!
- Поддержка на всех этапах: мы всегда рядом и готовы помочь в освоении работы.
Чем ты будешь заниматься:

Вакансия открыта в отдел BIG Data: здесь мы работаем с VIP-клиентами, которые совершили последнюю покупку более 2 месяцев назад. Акцент на индивидуальный подход, предложение новых продуктов, эксклюзивных акций и специальных условий.
Основные задачи:
- Обработка теплых клиентов (без поиска клиентов – база уже готова!).
- Узнавать потребности клиента и помогать выбрать подходящий продукт. Наша продукция - категория здоровье и красота
- Ведение клиентских данных в простой и понятной CRM-системе.
Что нужно от тебя:
- Грамотная речь, коммуникабельность и желание работать с людьми.
- Ноутбук/компьютер (ОС WINDOWS не ниже 10 версии, от 4 ГБ), гарнитура, высокоскоростной интернет (5 МБ в обе стороны).
- Желание зарабатывать и работать в стабильной компании.
- Возможность работать в тишине, где никто и ничто не будет отвлекать.
Присоединяйтесь к команде Callmedia! Откликайтесь прямо сейчас – стабильность и высокий доход ждут вас!

Search Systems Lead/Лид поисковых систем,Teez,"Алматы, улица Абиша Кекилбайулы, 139","до 3 000 000 ₸ за месяц, на руки","Teez — новый международный e-com проект. Мы создаем первый маркетплейс с доставкой товаров за один день в Казахстане.

Над запуском работает команда с большим бэкграундом. Мы построили и раскрутили e-com площадку KazanExpress до компании федерального масштаба в России. Использовали похожую модель в Узбекистане и быстро взлетели: приложение Uzum — самое скачиваемое в категории «Покупки» в узбекском App Store.
Ищем профессионалов, которые готовы строить компанию с нуля — вместе с сильными, смелыми и креативными спецами.
Что и как мы делаем:
Мы создаем беспрецедентно новый продукт в Казахстане и хотим, чтобы каждый член команды мог повлиять на него.
Мы принимаем смелые решения и стремимся к тому, чтобы история компании попала в учебники по бизнесу. Поэтому делаем то, что никто не делал, и так, как никто делал.
Мы строим команду, в которой каждый может высказаться — конструктивно и с уважением к коллегам. Умеем слушать других и относиться к критике как инструменту развития.

Мы быстрые во всем. Потому что в e-com все решает скорость: доставки, решений, мышления. Минимум бюрократии, минимум инстанций, минимум откладываний на потом, минимум бессмысленных созвонов и совещаний. Быстро решили, быстро сделали, быстро поехали дальше.
Что мы предлагаем:
Уникальная возможность построить все процессы с нуля в инновационном маркетплейсе
Высокую зарплату: мы готовы достойно платить классным специалистам за их время
Творческую реализацию: вы сможете предлагать идеи и внедрять их в проект так, как видите. Мы открыты для нестандартных решений и приветствуем креативный подход
Удобный формат работы, никакой бюрократии и трека времени. Можете работать удаленно, можете — в нашем современном комфортном офисе в Алматы.

Professor (Associate Professor) in Computer Science,ООО University of Central Asia,Не указано,Не указано,"Programme: Computer Science
School: School of Arts and Sciences
Reports to: Associate Dean, Naryn Campus
Duty Station: Naryn Campus, Naryn, Kyrgyzstan
Application Deadline: 19 May 2025
Contract Period: Fixed term for 2 years, renewable with potential transition to open-ended contract after 2 years
Position Summary

The University of Central Asia (UCA) is excited to offer a full-time residential faculty position in the Department of Computer Science at our Naryn Campus. This is an excellent opportunity for those passionate about research and teaching to contribute to a world-class undergraduate programme in Computer Science, originally developed in collaboration with the University of Toronto. As a faculty member, you will play an essential role in delivering cutting-edge courses, shaping an innovative curriculum, and engaging in impactful research that drives both academic excellence and regional development.

The position offers an outstanding platform for research leadership and academic collaboration, with an emphasis on shaping UCA’s research profile both locally and internationally. Faculty will also have the opportunity to engage in cross-disciplinary initiatives alongside UCA’s Graduate School of Development, focusing on high-impact areas such as Digital Policy, Cybersecurity, and Data Science. We are particularly eager to encourage applications from female scholars, supporting their contributions to advancing the field of Computer Science.

This position offers a unique opportunity to contribute to a growing institution with ambitious goals for regional impact and academic excellence. If you are a passionate, innovative, and forward-thinking educator and researcher, we encourage you to apply.
Qualification requirements
Minimum Qualifications
Ph.D. from a reputable university with specialization in Computer Science or Computer Engineering and a proven track record of research outputs, supervision and leadership.

Preference will be given to candidates with a proven and outstanding track record of teaching and research in Computer Science and having practical and research experience in different fields of computer science.
Fluency in English is required.
Outstanding record of research publication, knowledge exchange, impact and grant capture in collaborative projects.
Why Join UCA?
Impactful Teaching and Research: Contribute to an academic institution that is dedicated to fostering innovation and development in Central Asia and beyond.
Collaboration and Growth: Be part of a diverse, interdisciplinary academic environment, with opportunities for collaboration and research across multiple fields of societal relevance.
Regional Leadership: Lead the development of innovative solutions to regional challenges in technology, data science, and digital policy.
Support for Female Scholars: UCA is deeply committed to supporting female scholars in STEM fields, providing opportunities to further advance gender equity in academia
Teaching experience requirements:
Demonstrated subject knowledge and application in delivery across diverse core and elective courses
A demonstrated commitment to teaching and student learning experience. At least 5 years of teaching experience at the undergraduate level is expected
Experience of using and experimenting with innovative teaching methods and evaluation methodologies
The priority will be given to candidates who have experience in teaching the following courses:
Final Year Project I
Final Year Project II
Computer Architecture
Data Science
Software Engineering
Computer Networks
Mobile App Development
Internet of Things
Engage with the development of postgraduate programmes.
Research experience requirements:
A proven ability to publish research in web of sciences impact factor journals, Scopus indexed journals, ACM and AAAI conferences, NeurIPS, ICML or other top computer science venues
Leadership in knowledge exchange, developmental impact, collaborative research projects and grant capture
Aware of current and future industry trends
column2: strong network of industry contacts to support internship programs, project collaborations and industrial mentoring

column1: Interest in publishing research papers and working on research projects with undergraduate students.
Duties
Key Responsibilities

Teaching: Deliver courses across the Computer Science undergraduate curriculum, including courses on theoretical foundations, applied programming, and hardware concepts. Engage students through interactive lessons, hands-on projects, and practical lab work.
Curriculum Development: Contribute to the development and continuous improvement of the Computer Science curriculum, ensuring it remains at the forefront of global advancements in the field.

Research Leadership: Lead innovative research initiatives that align with UCA’s mission to drive regional development, especially in the areas of technology, innovation, and sustainability. Forge partnerships with industry, government, and academic institutions, both regionally and internationally.

Collaboration and community engagement: Foster synergies between the Computer Science department and other academic programs at UCA, particularly those focused on Data Science, Cybersecurity, Digital Policy and the development of the Central Asian Data Hub, through UCA’s Graduate School of Development.
About UCA’s Academic Programmes

UCA’s School of Arts and Sciences combines the best of a student-centred liberal arts environment with the intellectual rigor of a research university. The faculty is committed to offering an inclusive, engaging, and dynamic academic experience, delivered in English, to ensure that students are prepared to contribute meaningfully to both regional and global challenges. UCA encourages collaborative teaching, especially across disciplines such as Economics, Media and Communications, and Earth and Environmental Sciences, which provides opportunities for faculty to engage in a wide range of cross-disciplinary research.

Our Graduate School of Development is actively developing postgraduate programmes and focuses on research in areas such as Digital Policy and Cybersecurity. This provides additional opportunities for collaboration and knowledge exchange, allowing faculty to engage with and contribute to global developments in these fields.
Computer Science Programme Overview

UCA’s Computer Science programme is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of technology, from mathematical foundations to applied programming skills. The curriculum is built to empower students to engage with all aspects of the technology world, whether by launching a technology start-up or pursuing graduate studies. In addition to theoretical courses, students participate in hands-on lab work and practical projects that challenge them to solve real-world problems. Annual internships provide students with industry exposure and help build professional connections. The curriculum’s strong emphasis on interdisciplinary learning also allows students to apply their skills across a variety of fields, including business, development, and policy.
UCA Background:

The University of Central Asia (UCA) was founded in 2000 as a private, not for profit, secular university through an International Treaty signed by the Presidents of Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan and Kazakhstan, and His Highness the Aga Khan
column2: ratified by their respective parliaments, and registered with the United Nations. The Presidents are the Patrons of the University and His Highness is the Chancellor. UCA’s mission is to promote the social and economic development of Central Asia, particularly its mountain communities, by offering an internationally recognised standard of higher education and becoming a leading research university in the region and internationally. UCA brings with it the broader commitment and partnership of the Aga Khan Development Network.
